thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Credit Suisse Is Finally Finding Its Sweet Spot

author: Paul J. Davies
title: Credit Suisse Is Finally Finding Its Sweet Spot
text:
Credit Suisse is getting its house in order. Cost cuts give it a good base to benefit from private-equity deal making and any further pickup in action among its superwealthy clients.
As with other European banks, Credit Suisse took a hit from the U.S. tax overhaul its 2.3 billion Swiss francs ($2.5 billion) charge knocked it into the red for the full-year reported Wednesday. But investors are rewarding its improved ability to profit from increases in revenues. Its stock rose 3% on Wednesday and has outperformed its crosstown...
